miniapp.name: Endaoment
miniapp.subtitle: Fund students via DeFi yield
miniapp.description: Endaoment connects institutional donors with students through an innovative DeFi yield mechanism. Whales deposit stablecoins, and generated yield automatically funds student education.
miniapp.ogTitle: Endaoment - Fund Students Through DeFi Yield
miniapp.ogDescription: Connect institutional donors with students through DeFi yield. Sustainable funding for education powered by blockchain.
